text: Abaho, msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga iyagwe, ayo yakalile na udaho wa kuuhuma moto, kalawa behi na ikilingo cha kulavila nhosa na kumkema na dizwi kulu ayo yakalile na isengo inoligwe, “Sola sengo yako inoligwe ukakanhe ivikungwi va izizabibu kulawa mumzabibu wa iisi, kwavija zabibu zake zipa.” Zabibu
